chapters.title: The Return to Ayodhya
chapters.description: Rama and Sita return to Ayodhya after defeating Ravana, greeted by the people with joy.

chapters.title: The Doubt Arises
chapters.description: A segment of the populace questions Sita’s purity, casting doubts on her time in Lanka.

chapters.title: The Trial by Fire
chapters.description: To prove her chastity and truth, Sita willingly undergoes a trial by fire.

chapters.title: The Divine Testimony
chapters.description: The fire god Agni emerges, affirming Sita’s purity, silencing the doubts of the people.
